content: **knitted socks for children in drops nord the piece is worked in stocking stitch top down with nordic pattern gingerbread and hearts sizes 26 - 43 theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #gingerbreadlovesocks drops design pattern no-004-bn yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** shoe-size 26/28 - 29/31 - 32/34 - 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 17-18-20-22-24-27 cm leg-height to heel 13-14-15-19-20-21 cm **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50-50-100-100 g colour 22 chestnut 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 01 off white 50-50-50-50-50-50 g colour 14 red **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
